integration_patterns: FHIR API for healthcare data exchange

evidence.claim: RDA Healthcare Supply Chain Services utilizes AWS for scalable infrastructure needs.
They implement HIPAA compliance standards to secure patient data.
RDA uses X12 as part of its EDI processing for healthcare transactions.
Integration with FHIR APIs for efficient healthcare data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in X12 EDI transactions, fits healthcare automation use cases.
